skipiste.graph

Class GraphBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • skipiste.graph.GraphBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphBuilderInterface

    public class GraphBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphBuilderInterface
    Builds the network graph from input from a Set objects.
    Author:
    s1011122

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private DistanceCalculator calc
      Calculate the distance between two points
      private static int clusterDistance
      Start or End nodes less to or equal to this distance apart from each other will be clustered together into a single node.
      private static int lineInterSectionTolerance
      The tolerance we allow for line intersections, if the intersection of line a and line b is within this distance of both lines then the intersection node will be created.
      private java.util.HashSet<Piste> pistes
      The pistes in this graph

      • buildNodeAtIntersection

        protected Node buildNodeAtIntersection(Point intersection,
                           Piste piste1,
                           Piste piste2)
        Create a node at the given intersection, that is part of the pistes passed to this method.
        Parameters:
        intersection - - the intersection of two points which will be used for the longitude and latitude of this node.
        piste1 - - one of the pistes that this node will belong to.
        piste2 - - one of the pistes that this node will belong to.
        Returns:
        - the new node.

      • pointWithinTolerance

        protected boolean pointWithinTolerance(Point intersection,
                           LineSegment line1,
                           LineSegment line2,
                           double tolerance)
        Tests if the intersection point is within range of any of the other points. The haversine formula will be used to calculate if the intersection point is within range.
        Parameters:
        intersection - - the point we are testing to find out if it is in range
        tolerance - the range in meters.
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • findClusters

        protected java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashSet<Node>> findClusters(java.util.HashSet<Node> nodes)
        Finds a cluster in a hashSet of nodes. In this case a cluster of nodes is nodes that are joined by outbound edges
        Parameters:
        nodes - the HashSet of nodes that contain clusters
